item.description: Islam A cool religion. Origin Before Islam, Bedouins (nomads of Saudi Arabia) are mainly Christians, animist, Judaist, polytheistic, etc. Everything starts with Prophet Muhammad Prophet Muhammad Full name: Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim Meditated in cave for three days Archangel Gaberiel gave him the first Surah of the Koran Migrates (sijirah) out of Mecca to Medina because he was seen as crazy Later comes back in 629 CE with 1500 followers [!

Syncretic Religion A combination of multiple religions into one. A type of [[Examples of Cultural Diffusion|cultural diffusion]]. Examples: Sikhism (Northern India), Vodou (carribean), Sufism (Islam + Hinduism)
